attributes.action: Make a Law that Sentences of Imprisonment are fully served.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There should be No time off a sentence for good behaviour. Good Behaviour should mean you get out on completing your sentence.

 Bad Behaviour should mean your sentence is extended by appropriate amounts suitable to the behaviour commited.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
